name: batch_time
description: The time the batch was completed being processed

name: mean_bpm
description: Estimated from average of bpm during sleep/meal event (daily)

name: sd_bpm
description: Estimated from the standard deviation of bpm values during sleep/meal event (daily)

name: min_bpm
description: Minimum bpm value measured during sleep/meal event (daily)

name: max_bpm
description: Maximum bpm value measured during sleep/meal event (daily)

name: count_
description: Count of recorded bpm values during sleep/meal event (daily)
